title: L'Oréal Acquires ModiFace
description: L'Oréal acquires ModiFace, a leading AR beauty technology company, marking a major milestone in AI adoption in beauty.

title: Generative AI Transforms Beauty Content
description: Beauty brands begin using GPT and DALL-E for product descriptions, marketing content, and virtual influencer creation.

title: EU AI Act Impacts Beauty Tech
description: EU AI Act comes into effect, requiring beauty AI applications (especially diagnostic tools) to meet new compliance standards.
